channel.title: Activate Conference 2018 on Keisha S Perkins
channel.description: Recent content in Activate Conference 2018 on Keisha S Perkins

item.title: Using JavaScript Libraries for Game Development
item.description: This talk is about using JavaScript to create games on the HTML5 canvas. Though you won’t create the next Halo, you’ll learn so much about JavaScript and programming as a whole when you create games with it. In this talk, I’ll introduce you to a library that’s perfect for beginners and “non-coders” alike called p5.js. Why JavaScript? JavaScript is everywhere. If you use the internet, you’ve almost certainly encountered JavaScript.

item.title: An Introduction to P5.js
item.description: Here are the slides to a talk I did in February of 2018 called "Using JavaScript Libraries for Game Development: An Introduction to P5.js". The talk is meant to show how the p5.js library can be used as a tool for learning JavaScript while having fun making games. The notes to this talk are also available.
